text: When the teacher hands out the grades, Timothee with the lowest mark throws his peers’ crayons without saying any word.
Richard interrupts the queue using his loud voice, but when peers start complaining, he stares at them and then pushes.
Pinto practices in the school choir, but when the instructor shouts at him, he stays quiet and later cries alone..
Gina’s friend tells her that she’d only go to the function if she wears Gina’s prettiest dress.
Ponty and Roberta ask all students whether they prefer long lunches or extra time for classes, and listen and note all responses on the board.
